author: jm
msg: use buildbot scheduler to stagger mass-check startup times, to avoid peak load

author: yonik
msg: prevent blocking on lookahead after EOL: SANDBOX-173

author: jonesde
msg: Changed the checking of conditions for a virtual product if the main product is a variant to be done when it is a category condition, and added a note to continue not doing it for feature conditions; also added a note that in the future we might want to parameterize this, but for now this seems to address the most common behavior you'd want for virtual and variant products with price rules
